author: sdeboy
msg: SMTPAppender now supports an optional 'expression' param that will cause DefaultEvaluator to use ExpressionRule for trigger evaluation.
NOTE: TriggeringEventEvaluator and o.a.l.Rule appear similar enough to support consolidation

author: ceki
msg: - Log4j interfaces implement o.a.l.spi.Component and base classes extend ComponentBase. Started by changing the Appender interface and AppenderSkeleton class,
